user.title: Setup your Carelink account
user.description: Run the external script to get the session information. These can be copied as a file into the Carelink Integration directory, or the values ??of the parameters can be entered into this mask. If you are logging in with a Carelink Care Partner account, please provide Patient ID. This should be the primary Carelink account username. The Scan Interval determines the number of seconds before the data is collected again.
